topic.title: Hospital Discharge Instructions Section - conformance rules

lines.i: The Hospital Discharge Instructions section records instructions at discharge.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:10395 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.41"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:15357)/@code="8653-8" Hospital Discharge Instructions (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:15358)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:15357)/@code="8653-8" Hospital Discharge Instructions (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:15358)
